text: Stephen E. Weiss is an associate professor of policy and international business at the Schulich School of Business, York University (from 2012-2015, he was the academic director for their MBA program) and a consultant and coach at Weiss Negotiations. ==Education== * International relations and conflict analysis, Ph.D., University of Pennsylvania. ==Personal life== In 1989, he married Ellen Auster, when he was a professor at the New York University Stern School of Business.Ellen Auster Wed To Stephen Weiss ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:York University faculty Category:University of Pennsylvania alumni Category:New York University Stern School of Business faculty
title: Stephen E. Weiss
